name: Cissi
description: Karro has supported me in my role as product owner. She has a phenomenal ability to get to the core of what I want to communicate and thus makes me re-think my objectives. With dazzling tonality, creative grip and a strong sense of how to develop the core initiative, she has been a very big asset. I would love to work more with Karro in the future if I get the chance.

name: Hasse
description: Karolina, it has been a pleasure working with you. You have always tried to inspire, ensemble and challenge the rest of your colleagues. Always with a very happy mood. Good luck with all the future challenges you intend to take. Hope we will meet somewhere on the road in the future!

name: Cattis
description: Karolina has been an amazing colleague with a lot of drive and great enthusiasm. She has done her job excellently and I give her my warmest recommendations.

name: Johanna
meta: Scrum master and Project manager, Tritech
description: Combine a smart, funny and creative person who also is a beloved colleague with great organizational skills and structured planning - and you have Karro. She truly has an eye for that little extra that makes an event-, a business card or some online content pop.
